Trade/Device Name(s): Power Processor Sample Processing System with Generic Connection Module
Power Processor Sample Processing System with Generic Connection Module Software Version 5.0
Power Processor Sample Processing System with Generic Connections
Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Power Processor Sample Processing System with Generic Connection Module V5.0, a laboratory automation and sample handling system upgrade with connections to various clinical analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated sample handling system for processing and preparing sample tubes for clinical analyzers, including presentation and sorting for instruments using immunoassays for analytes such as Vitamin B12, Ferritin, Folate, and hTSH, used to aid diagnosis and treatment of related disorders.
